title: Amazing views, spacious Studio great amenities, 536 sq ft
posting_body: ['-- The Covington Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1475', 'Apartment:', 'Studio Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '536 sq ft', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', "These words aren't ours-", "they're just some of the incredible reviews that you'll find describing The Covington Apartment Homes in Bloomington, Minnesota.", 'We work hard to make The Covington a great place to live, and we would love to welcome you into our friendly apartment community.', 'At The Covington we offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments that are bright, open, and modern.', 'Each of our units has grand nine-foot ceilings, beautiful plank flooring, private balconies, and oversized windows that capture the surrounding views.', "You're sure to enjoy the community amenities that make our property stand out from the crowd.", 'Our rooftop patio has a convenient grilling station and a luxurious pool where you can relax and unwind.', 'Reserve and enjoy our theater room or bocce court for a memorable Friday night with friends, or work out in our first-rate fitness center to stay in shape.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly -
